value: Old Grace Church, 23 Cedar Shore Drive, is listed on the National Register of Historic Places in the United States of America

Massapequa is home to more than 20,000 residents. Inside Massapequa is a smaller village known as Massapequa Park, but many of the locals don't consider the two to be any different. It has been home to many famous and infamous celebrities including Jerry Seinfeld, The Baldwin Brothers, The Baldinger Brothers, Elliot Easton, Charlie Kaufman, and Joey Buttafuoco.
Massapequa has a station on the Babylon Line of the
The main roads in and out of here are Sunrise Highway and Merrick Road. If traveling through Long Island it is recommended that one takes the Southern State Parkway or Sunrise Highway to arrive.
Nassau Inter-County Express operates a number of bus connections to Massapequa.
The nearest airport is Republic Airport; however,
It is advisable to have a car in order to get around, but a bike could do the trick if you don't mind riding on roads.
